word.name: Caring
word.words: Caring means showing others love and kindness

word.name: Silly
word.words: Silly means being really playful

word.name: Friendly
word.words: If you’re a friendly person, you’re nice and helpful

word.name: Funny
word.words: If you’re funny, you must make people laugh a lot!

word.name: Kind
word.words: Kind means being gentle and nice

word.name: Helpful
word.words: Helpful means being there for others when they need you

word.name: Loved
word.words: Loved means that someone really cares about you

word.name: Special
word.words: Special means really important

word.name: Awesome
word.words: Awesome means really great, wonderful, and terrific!

word.name: Brave
word.words: Brave means being strong and showing courage

word.name: Cheerful
word.words: Cheerful means you’re in a happy mood

word.name: Different
word.words: Different means that there are special things about you

word.name: Giving
word.words: Giving means that you share what you have with others

word.name: Hopeful
word.words: Hopeful means having good thoughts about the future

word.name: Thoughtful
word.words: Being thoughtful means thinking about how others might feel

word.name: Strong
word.words: Strong means being able to get through hard things that may come your way

word.name: Creative
word.words: Creative people have lots of ideas and use their imagination!

word.name: Curious
word.words: Curious means you really want to know more about something

word.name: Persistent
word.words: Being persistent means trying and trying again

word.name: Valued
word.words: Valued means that you’re really important to someone

word.name: Determined
word.words: Determined means that you won’t give up

word.name: Thankful
word.words: If you’re thankful about something, you’re glad it happened

word.name: Unique
word.words: Unique is another way to say really special

word.name: Optimistic
word.words: Optimistic means having good thoughts

vo.words: What We Are Music Maker!
Hola! Welcome back! Mira! Look! New words! Let’s make another song!
To play in English, click on the COLOR button
To play in Spanish, click on the COLOR button
Hola! It’s me, Rosita, and this is my music-making friend, Bobby Tunebot!
(CHEERFUL TONES) Beep. Boop. Beep.
He loves to make songs!
(“LET’S MAKE ONE TOGETHER!”) Beep. Beep. Boop. Beep!
Bobby says you can make your own song with him! Si! Let's get started!
To start making your sing, choose three words!
Great word choice!
Que bien
Fantasico, amigo
Way to go
You chose a great word
I love the word you chose
Wonderful word, amigo
Keep going, amigo! Choose two more words to add to your song!
You're almost finished! Choose one more word!
I can't wait to listen to your song, amigo! Choose one more word!
Your song is almost ready, amigo! Choose one more word!
click the green button.
To listen to your song again, tap on this button!
To make a new song, tap on this button!

to.words: to find a word, click on a picture
to find a word, click on one of the pictures
just click on a word
just click on a picture
to choose this word for your song, click on the green button!
to choose a different word, click on the red button
to choose this word, click on the green button!
If you don't want to choose this word, click on the red button
if you want to change a word in your song click on the red x next to the word.
if you want to change a word in your song click on the red x next to the word on bobby's belly.

phrase.words: oops, you already chose that word!
click on a different word
click on a different picture
you chose the words...
listen for them in your song
Mira! You can play these drums to hear your words!
Mira! You can play along!
Ready? Hit it, Bobby!
That was maravilloso! You made a beautiful song! Great job, my friend!
That was a really cool song that you made! You rock, amigo!
Oh, I loved that song! And I love the words you chose! ¡Fantastico!
(CHEERFUL BEEPS – “Good job!”) Beep boop!
And you played along very well! Muy bien!
Great job playing along, too!

vo.words: What We Are Music Maker!
Hola! Welcome back! Mira! Look! New words! Let’s make another song!
To play in English, click on the COLOR button
To play in Spanish, click on the COLOR button
Hola! It’s me, Rosita, and this is my music-making friend, Bobby Tunebot!
(CHEERFUL TONES) Beep. Boop. Beep.
He loves to make songs!
(“LET’S MAKE ONE TOGETHER!”) Beep. Beep. Boop. Beep!
Bobby says you can make your own song with him! Si! Let's get started!
To start making your sing, choose three words!
Great word choice!
Que bien
Fantasico, amigo
Way to go
You chose a great word
I love the word you chose
Wonderful word, amigo
Keep going, amigo! Choose tow more words to add to your song!
You're almost finished! Choose one more word!
I can't wait to listen to your song, amigo! Choose one more word!
Your song is almost ready, amigo! Choose one more word!
Now click Bobby's nose to hear your song.
To listen to your song again, tap on this button!
To make a new song, tap on this button!
